Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 95th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1972...
Injured on 5/26/1973 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 9/1/1981, off John Candelaria (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1982, off Terry Forster (TEX)...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/14/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/14/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $2,582,585 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1989, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/6/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
